entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:17 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:53 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 01:16 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -5.5°C
Wind: NNW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 9:07 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:07 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 9:07 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
